title: Is there anyone who like to post a guest post in my blog? - Quora

response.answer_text: What are your blog parameters: DA, Alexa, MozRank ?  What niche ?  How old is it?  Do you have social media followers for your blog?

Hello Vikas, First of all We want to know that which type of your Blog is? and which type of topics it will be included? tell us more about your blog and visits that its getting per month and many more about the same.

No. You ask a blanket question without giving specifics about your topic or who your audience is. You don't list details about length of the requested postYou don't tell me why would it be beneficial for me to guest post for your blogIf you give more specifics and the topic is one I'm comfortable with I might change my mind
I wants to know what is the niche of your blog. I would like to do a guest post in your blog.
You Can Guest Post on my Blog too :) Write For Us – TheGuideX And Yes You Can reach me too… I'll Too guest post on your blog, if it belong to blogging guide
